StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: OncoArray: Consortium of Investigators of Modifiers of BRCA1 and BRCA2 (CIMBA)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Genotyping of the OncoArray was funded by the Government of Canada through Genome Canada and the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, the Ministère de l’Économie, de la Science et de l'Innovation du Québec through Genome Québec, the Quebec Breast Cancer Foundation for the PERSPECTIVE project, the US National Institutes of Health (NIH) [1 U19 CA 148065 for the Discovery, Biology and Risk of Inherited Variants in Breast Cancer (DRIVE) project; X01HG007492 to the Centre for Inherited Disease Research (CIDR)], Cancer Research UK [C1287/A16563], Odense University Hospital Research Foundation (Denmark), the National R&D Program for Cancer Control, Ministry of Health & Welfare, Republic of Korea [1420190], the Italian Association for Cancer Research [AIRC, IG16933] and German Cancer Aid [110837]. CIMBA is funded by Cancer Research UK [C12292/A20861 and C12292/A11174.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast and Ovarian cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BROC-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast and Ovarian cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BRCA-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast and Ovarian cancer, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BROC-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Breast and Ovarian cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, MDS, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-MDS-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms). Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Cancer, Benign Neoplasms, or Hematopoietic Diseases (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: CABNHD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use the data must related to cancer, benign neoplasms, or hematopoietic diseases related to cancer or risk of cancer. Benign neoplasms and hematopoietic diseases are understood as having potential for significant morbidity in themselves, such as benign brain tumors, neuroendocrine tumors, desmoid tumors, myelodysplastic syndromes, which are reportable or potentially reportable to cancer registries. This data may also be used for general methods research (e.g. development of software or algorithms).
